description.value: At 16th level, creatures of the animal or plant types donâ€™t attack you unless compelled to do so by magic or you attack them first. Three times per day, you can transport yourself from one tree to another tree, as @Compendium[pf1.spells.6x6epf4g5wgzl1gh]{Tree Stride} with half the transport range. Moving from one tree to another in this manner is a move action. You gain these abilities even while not bloodraging.
